website_summaries.verdict: A durable and versatile product that easily folds when not in use. Generous 44-inch jumping area.
pros: Elastic cords offer 50% reduction of impact vs. traditional rebounders
Unique curved legs give added stability
cons: Some users say the trampoline is hard to put together

customer_reviews.title: Perfect bounce.  Strong and safe feel.
customer_reviews.text: Great product. You have to put it together but if you youtube N1FIT trampoline you will see a how to video explaining how to install the bungee cords so it stays even throughout. I left a numbered diagram in pics. Follow this and it is hassle free. I was having problems till i found the youtube video. Great jump. Got this for my 8 year old and I to share. We are both thrilled.
customer_reviews.author: Sophia J.

customer_reviews.title: Cheap Quality
customer_reviews.text: Revision: After owning the rebounder for just 4 months, I have had to replace all bungees. After purchasing the new bungees, the loop connecting the mat to the bungee completely tore away while I was jumping, so I can no longer even use it. I am so disappointed. Don't waste your money.
customer_reviews.author: Renee P.

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic bounce, very high quality for the price, but difficult to put together
customer_reviews.text: Easy to put together... until you get to the bungees. Attaching the bungees take a lot of muscle and is a two-person job. The assembly hassle was well worth it, though. This trampoline is a blast. Comfortable, quiet, and bouncy. Taller than expected, however, and not easy to store. It now is a permanent fixture in my family room but the upside of that is that I will use it much more often. (I've been using it daily.)
customer_reviews.author: Lori R.

customer_reviews.title: UPDATE
customer_reviews.text: UPDATE, I originally had trouble with this item but the company/seller reached out to me to make things right. I appreciate them going out if their way to ensure I was satisfied with my purchase. I may have received a faulty one as everyone else seems to have not had the problem I did with my original one.
customer_reviews.author: Karla H.

customer_reviews.title: I was so excited to get this
customer_reviews.text: My handy husband and I spent a long time putting this together. When it came to the part where you use the hook and attach the rope/springs, there seemed to be a design flaw. It didn't look at all like the diagram which showed loops and ours had tabs. We were getting so frustrated because one of the tubes kept pulling apart, we finally disassembled what we had and packed it up and sent it back. I'm going to try to find one in a store that I don't have to assemble.
customer_reviews.author: Susie V.

customer_reviews.title: Very bouncy & fun
customer_reviews.text: I love this trampoline. Its very bouncy whitch was what i was loking for. The set up was easy intil you get to putting the bungee cords. I tried for hours. I eventually took it to my brother & he had them on in 10 minutes. The video on Youtube was very helful. I've had other mini trampoline but none compare to this one. Its fun and bouncy. I use it everyday now that I cant go to the gym.I love it!
customer_reviews.author: Cubarelis

customer_reviews.title: Super Bouncy  (after the hard work of assembly)
customer_reviews.text: Love the great bounce - much better than my last mini tramp. Opening the box revealed a daunting collection of nuts, bolts, washers and other hardware. Assembly was simple but time intensive taking more than two hours. Product ended up being worth the time and money. Super bouncy mini tramp if you don't mind a little work.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Still

customer_reviews.title: N1Fit
customer_reviews.text: It was a somewhat difficult to put together . I watched the video several times. However...it turned out great, quiet, and a good size. Glad I purchased it. Let’s get FIT.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy K.

customer_reviews.title: perfect for product but picture misleading
customer_reviews.text: almost sent back due to shipment picture has arched legs and i ordered bar for straight legs. it was right product wrong picture
customer_reviews.author: linda s zisk

customer_reviews.title: My Dog Loves It
customer_reviews.text: A nice quiet bounce, needed husband to help get the bands on - it is a little difficult. It's sturdy and works great for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Alison Johnson

customer_reviews.title: following the directions exactly is very impr
customer_reviews.text: Very nice and good quality. Very important to place spring cords 1 between every 2 legs at a time. Its rather difficult to place the last 2 between each leg but the 3rd 4th and fth are fairly easy.
customer_reviews.author: skent

customer_reviews.title: Tough assembly but worth it!!!
customer_reviews.text: Great product! Feels like the Rebounder... only thing is it’s TOUGH to put together. Even following their rules and order... ya gotta have some crazy strength to get the tethers around!! But once you do. Voila!! It’s awesome!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: False information in description -assembley requires.
customer_reviews.text: Advertised as just just 3 steps to get started. It came in pieces. Lots of pieces. Instructions are vague and only illustrations in small print. I’ve used it several times and so far it seems fine. .
customer_reviews.author: Emay

customer_reviews.title: Great rebounder!
customer_reviews.text: Love my rebounder! Wasn’t too hard to assemble if you watch the YouTube video.
customer_reviews.author: melissa martinez

customer_reviews.title: how much strength it takes to put together!
customer_reviews.text: I like it but was extremely hard to put together. Use for rebounding exercise
customer_reviews.author: franceslucas

customer_reviews.title: Not fun
customer_reviews.text: Arrived without springs or fabric, just the metal frame. It's hard to get much exercise.
customer_reviews.author: Glenn Phillips

customer_reviews.title: Fun exercise!
customer_reviews.text: Go look at a rebounder video on Youtube and see if you think it looks fun. This rebounder is perfectly quiet, so you can watch TV if you want. Great low impact activity. The quality seems great so far, but it has only been a month. The bungee cords were not so easy to attach, but you only have to put them on once.
customer_reviews.author: Kathie Legendre

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Quality Rebounder
customer_reviews.text: Great quality product and the stability you feel when rebounding is equally as great. I am 62 years old and using it to help my Lymphatic System stay its best. The only thing I would suggest is to have it assembled or to have someone that can assemble it for you it you do not have strong upper body strength.
customer_reviews.author: Deborah Ball

customer_reviews.title: disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Very difficult to assemble due to tension of bungees; after 6 months of regular use, 3 bungees have broken.
customer_reviews.author: BDBR

product_meta.title: N1Fit Rebounders Mini Trampolines for Adults 40"- Fitness Trampoline, Workout Trampoline, Rebounder Trampoline for Adults and Kids, Personal Trampoline with Bungee Rope System Home Workouts
feature_bullets: ULTRALOW-NOISE - Workout trampoline for adults - quietest mini tramp rebounder on the market
LOW IMPACT BOUNCES - 30 elastic cords offers over 50% reduction on impact vs traditional rebounders
FOLDING DESIGN - Exercise trampoline w/ arched legs provide incomparable stability and safety
STURDY Steel Frame - fitness trampoline for adults with rust-resistant powder coated steel frame
SAFE & BIGGER SPACE - Your personal trampoline for adults includes a waterproof PVC pad cover cords

Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
